long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your YouTube experience with Caption Enhancer, the ultimate tool for language learners! This extension lets you view captions in two languages simultaneously, making it easier than ever to learn a new language while enjoying your favorite videos. Whether you're a beginner or advanced learner, improve your vocabulary and comprehension on the go!

Key Features:

- Dual-language captions: Watch videos with captions in both your native language and the language you're learning.
- Instant word definitions: Easily find the meaning of any word by simply selecting it in the captions.
- Smooth learning experience: Designed to boost your understanding and retention by integrating language learning into your everyday YouTube watching.
